title: 3 Pairs Merino Wool Ski Socks Thermal Warm Winter Thick Knee High Snowboarding Skiing Socks for Women Men
description: PREMIUM MERINO WOOL: Sandsuced unisex thermal ski socks are made of 70% Merino Wool, 23% Polyester, 5% Spandex, 2% Nylon. These socks have great temperature regulation and excellent moisture control to keep feet fresh and odor free.

SIZE & PACKAGE: There are 2 sizes as options, Medium(Men 6-8.5 / Women 5.5-10 ) and Large(Men 8.5-12 / Women 10-13). And there are 3 pairs merino wool knee high ski socks in one pack for mens and womens! Great partner for your outdoor sports.

FULL CUSHIONING PROTECTION: Designing with full cushioning, these merino wool warm socks have better shock absorption and protect your feet well. The reinforced heel can prevent blister and the thicken toe does not grind feet, the thermal inner can keep feet warmer and more comfortable.

COMPRESSION SUPPORT DESIGN: These thick winter ski socks have wide compression zone for better protection.With arch support and ankle support, these compression area provide enhanced stability and reduce the risk of injuries such as fasciitis and Achilles. They keep your feet and ankles properly supported and protected, allowing you to ski with confidence and enjoy every moment on the slopes.
GREAT GIFTS FOR MEN & WOMEN: The winter wool socks are excellent gifts for womens and mens, they can be birthday gifts, Valentine's Day gifts, Christmas gifts, etc.
